text: Skrapež (; ), is a river in central Serbia. It is long and it flows into Đetinja river, which some later creates West Morava, along with the Golijska Moravica. Skrapež belongs to the Black Sea drainage basin. The river originates on the southeastern slope of Povlen mountain, at the confluence of two smaller rivers: Sečnica and Godljevača. ==References== ==Bibliography== * * Category:Rivers of Serbia Category:Zlatibor District Category:Kolubara District
title: Skrapež (river)
